name: ACH_PROGRESS_STORY00
description: Tutorial clear! Let's keep up the good work as Hamonaiza! (Yum)

name: ACH_PROGRESS_STORY01
description: Yeah, let's go through the ruins, little by little. Don't be reckless. (Hina)

name: ACH_PROGRESS_STORY02
description: We're well on our way through the ruins! Let's keep moving up! (Yum)

name: ACH_PROGRESS_STORY03
description: Let's just go through the ruins and get the former Demon King. Let's just get this over with. (???)ã€€

name: ACH_PROGRESS_STORY04
description: All sorts of people come to Hell. The longer you don't mind, the longer you can keep going. Be that as it may, let's aim for the next level. (Yum)

name: ACH_PROGRESS_STORY05
description: When we are harmonizers, we are asked to do a lot of different jobs. Sometimes we get to consult on the residents' problems, sometimes we get to run around the ruins. Yeah, it's a lot of things. (Hina)

name: ACH_PROGRESS_STORY06
description: Hamonaiza, we're always looking for you! If you're interested, check out the employment information and work rules! It's like. (Yum)

name: ACH_PROGRESS_STORY07
description: Hell, you know, we receive a lot of stuff from outside of hell. From Heaven, Interval, and many other places. (Hina)

name: ACH_PROGRESS_STORY08
description: There's a former Demon King on the level 10. Let's just capture them and finish the training! But still it's a tall building, it's not good for our legs. (Yum)

name: ACH_PROGRESS_STORY09
description: Ah, yes, let's catch the former Demon King. When we catch them, I guess we'll have a sermon contest... (Hina)

name: ACH_PAYDAY
description: The 20th of every month is our payday. Yeah, let's think carefully about how we spend our money. (Hina)

name: ACH_TRANSFER
description: The transporter room, you see, is a facility that you can use to transfer goods. Why don't you give it a [TRY]? (Leeds)

name: ACH_EMPLOYMENT
description: The employment office is exactly what the name implies. If you're short on staff, you should come by. (Heathersh)

name: ACH_CREATE_BOOK
description: Ah, do you have fragments of the book? If you have them, please come to the binding room. I'll repair it. (Imram)

name: ACH_CATCH_REBEL5
description: Yeah, it's our job to get the people who got away. Our goal is 5 people. (Hina)

name: ACH_CATCH_REBEL15
description: It looks like there are quite a few people still living in the ruins. I guess our goal is to capture 15 of them. (Hina)

name: ACH_CATCH_REBEL30
description: Looks like there are still some of the inhabitants left in the ruins. I wonder if we'll catch them all and have a sermon contest. (Hina)

name: ACH_HARMONIZER_RANK10
description: The rating of Hamonaiza is very important. The higher it is, the higher the salary will be. First, let's aim for rank 10. (Yum)

name: ACH_HARMONIZER_RANK25
description: Hamonaiza's rating, it's important. This will be on the exam. Let's aim for a good Hamonaiza. Let's aim for rank of 25. (Yum)

name: ACH_HARMONIZER_RANK50
description: The rating of the Hamonaiza is very important. Let's accumulate work and trust to become a high Hamonaiza. Once you reach rank 50, you're on your own. (Yum)

name: ACH_GET_COIN_50000
description: I guess money is still important in Hell. If I have about 50,000 coins, we can buy a lot of things. (Hina)

name: ACH_GET_COIN_100000
description: To get ready to explore at the store, yeah, I'll need some coin. And I feel like we could buy some good stuff with 100,000. (Hina)

name: ACH_GET_COIN_250000
description: I've heard that the store in the ward will sell you a lot of things if they're harmonizers. I feel like I can buy whatever I want with 250,000 coins. (Hina)

name: ACH_CONSUME_COIN_50000
description: If you're shopping, please go to Hellmart! Well, you can go to other stores. The best way to learn about the section is to shop! How about spending a quick 50,000? I'd recommend having a meal too. (Galan)

name: ACH_CONSUME_COIN_100000
description: Hellmart is open all year round! The pay for that is...well, that's just the way it is. The best way to learn about the section is to shop! Why don't you try spending 100,000 or so quickly? There are all sorts of shops, like weapon stores and stuffed animal stores. (Galan)

name: ACH_CONSUME_COIN_250000
description: Be sure to head over to Hellmart for your magazine! They don't keep magazines in the library. The best way to learn about the section is to shop! Why don't you try spending 250,000 or so quickly? You could buy some jewelry. (Galan)

name: ACH_FLOOR_COMP5
description: There's a lot to discover when we explore every nook and cranny, I highly recommend it, let's explore all 5 or so. (Yum)

name: ACH_FLOOR_COMP10
description: Hamonaiza does a lot of footwork. Exploring is a daily occurrence. Thanks to this, my shoes are always overworked. But aside from that, let's explore all 10 places. (Yum)

name: ACH_FLOOR_COMP15
description: We find a lot of things as we explore. Mushrooms, cabbages and so on. It's a good idea to get used to exploring and to be able to call yourself a exploration master. We'll explore all 15 or so places. (Yum)

name: ACH_TRAINING
description: There is a training center for harmonizers in the section. You can choose from four different training centers. Any of them will do, but you might want to complete one first. (Chief)

name: ACH_ADVANCED_TRAINING
description: There are also more advanced training centers available. Any of them will do, but you might want to try completing one first. Don't loosen up, even if it's training. (Chief)

name: ACH_RIMIS_TRAINING
description: I'm currently working on creating my own awesome training center. I hope you'll experience and completion of the course. (Rimis)

name: ACH_QUEST_CLEAR5
description: Hamonaiza's work includes solving the problems of the residents of the section. Let's start by solving about 5 cases. (Yum)

name: ACH_QUEST_CLEAR10
description: Residents of the section have a lot of problems. This is a painful headache. If you can help, good luck with that. Let's resolve about 10 of them and get the hang of it. (Yum)

name: ACH_QUEST_CLEAR30
description: When we live in a section, we need a lot of things. As a hamonaiza, let's do our best to make the lives of our residents better. Once you resolve 30 of their problems, you'll be used to it. (Yum)

name: ACH_PRESENT30
description: You can give the residents a variety of presents. They'll be especially happy if it's something they like, so why don't you give them 30 of them? (Hina)

name: ACH_PRESENT60
description: Often, what you don't need is very necessary to someone else. So, yes, it's a good idea to deliver them to someone who needs them. Let's go out on a limb and give them about 60 presents. (Hina)

name: ACH_PRESENT100
description: It would be nice to be able to thank the residents of the section for their help or something like that, who have been with us in our quest. Yeah, maybe we could give them 100 presents. (Hina)
